children.contentText: Show off your collection. Embed OpenSea NFTs by clicking on the prompts below or typing /openseaAdd a bookmark to your OpenSea collection analytics by typing /bookmarkYou can build an analytics dashboard for your collection using Dune and embed the charts and tables in CharmVerse by typing /dune. Using Dune does require some technical chops. If you don't have the chops, ask a friend   Collection Holders

children.contentText: Help your members find your stuff. Customize the callouts below with links to your social. Add a callout by typing /callout. Highlight text to bring up the action bar and select the link icon to add a link.Apply MusicSpotifyFollow me on TwitterFollow me on InstagramFollow me on FacebookWatch me on YouTube

children.title: Get Involved

content.text: Engage your fans! Embed forms to collect information using the
command. You can select from a Google Form, Airtable, or Typeform.
Apply to be a Super Fan!!!
Get input from your members! Insert a poll by typing
Let us know what you think

children.title: Exclusive Content

content.text: You can restrict access to this page and subpages using
You can choose to add a Private link or a Token Gate
role to the link you create. Members who join your space through this link will be assigned the attached role.

in the upper right corner of this page

children.contentText: You can restrict access to this page and subpages using role-based access control.  1. Create a role for exclusive accessClick Settings in the left side menuClick Roles & Permissions, then Add a role 2. Build an invite link and include roleClick Invite Members in the left side menuClick AddYou can choose to add a Private link or a Token GateAttach exclusive access role to the link you create. Members who join your space through this link will be assigned the attached role.Share invite link with members who should have access to the exclusive content on this page and subpages. 3. Set page permissionsClick Share in the upper right corner of this pageRemove access from EveryoneInvite your exclusive access role with the desired permissions level
